name: Sparse Index

runs.name: Sparse index select
runs.description: Get the highest priority item title assigned to the user 'Bill Gates'
result: In IE 6.0 the site toolbox is shifted 1px to the right

initialJoinSQL: SELECT * FROM users u join tasks t on t.assignee=u.id
solutionSQL: SELECT u.name, t.priority, t.title FROM users u join tasks t on t.assignee=u.id
